{{title|RAND_MAX}}
{{cpp/numeric/random/navbar}}
{{ddcl | header=cstdlib |
#define RAND_MAX /*implementation defined*/
}}

Expands to an integer constant expression equal to the maximum value returned by the function {{lc|std::rand}}. This value is implementation dependent. It's guaranteed that this value is at least {{c|32767}}.

===Example===
{{example|code=
#include &lt;climits&gt;
#include &lt;cstdlib&gt;
#include &lt;ctime&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;

int main()
{
    // use current time as seed for random generator
    std::srand(std::time(NULL));
 
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "RAND_MAX: " &lt;&lt; RAND_MAX &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; "INT_MAX: " &lt;&lt; INT_MAX &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; "Random value on [0,1]: "
              &lt;&lt; static_cast&lt;double&gt;(std::rand()) / RAND_MAX &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true|output=
RAND_MAX: 2147483647
INT_MAX: 2147483647
Random value on [0,1]: 0.618608
}}
